lexUnit.name: confidence.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: the feeling of certainty about something

sentence.text: We will introduce legislation designed to give consumers confidence that what they purchase is properly described -- and that adequate compensation is offered where these requirements are not met .
